###MULTIVARIATE GAUSSIAN:
<br>

The univariate Gaussian is:

$$f(x) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\exp\left(-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}(x-\mu)^2\right), \forall \in \mathbb R.$$
